QueryList.Join: <%if(has(address)){%> AND address=:address <%}%> <%else if (has(address_not)){%> and A.address <> :address_not <%}%> <%else if (has(address_li)){%> and A.address like '%'||:address_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(id)){%> AND id=:id <%}%> <%else if (has(id_not)){%> and A.id <> :id_not <%}%> <%else if (has(id_li)){%> and A.id like '%'||:id_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(tenantId)){%> AND tenantId=:tenantId <%}%> <%else if (has(tenantId_not)){%> and A.tenantId <> :tenantId_not <%}%> <%else if (has(tenantId_li)){%> and A.tenantId like '%'||:tenantId_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(employer)){%> AND employer=:employer <%}%> <%else if (has(employer_not)){%> and A.employer <> :employer_not <%}%> <%else if (has(employer_li)){%> and A.employer like '%'||:employer_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(phone)){%> AND phone=:phone <%}%> <%else if (has(phone_not)){%> and A.phone <> :phone_not <%}%> <%else if (has(phone_li)){%> and A.phone like '%'||:phone_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(qq)){%> AND qq=:qq <%}%> <%else if (has(qq_not)){%> and A.qq <> :qq_not <%}%> <%else if (has(qq_li)){%> and A.qq like '%'||:qq_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(email)){%> AND email=:email <%}%> <%else if (has(email_not)){%> and A.email <> :email_not <%}%> <%else if (has(email_li)){%> and A.email like '%'||:email_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(serviceType)){%> AND serviceType=:serviceType <%}%> <%else if (has(serviceType_not)){%> and A.serviceType <> :serviceType_not <%}%> <%else if (has(serviceType_li)){%> and A.serviceType like '%'||:serviceType_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(serviceStatus)){%> AND serviceStatus=:serviceStatus <%}%> <%else if (has(serviceStatus_not)){%> and A.serviceStatus <> :serviceStatus_not <%}%> <%else if (has(serviceStatus_li)){%> and A.serviceStatus like '%'||:serviceStatus_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(remark)){%> AND remark=:remark <%}%> <%else if (has(remark_not)){%> and A.remark <> :remark_not <%}%> <%else if (has(remark_li)){%> and A.remark like '%'||:remark_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(extend)){%> AND extend=:extend <%}%> <%else if (has(extend_not)){%> and A.extend <> :extend_not <%}%> <%else if (has(extend_li)){%> and A.extend like '%'||:extend_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(personnelInfoId)){%> AND personnelInfoId=:personnelInfoId <%}%> <%else if (has(personnelInfoId_not)){%> and A.personnelInfoId <> :personnelInfoId_not <%}%> <%else if (has(personnelInfoId_li)){%> and A.personnelInfoId like '%'||:personnelInfoId_li||'%' <%}%> <%if (has(orderby)) {%> ORDER BY A.${orderby} <%if (has(sort)){%> ${sort} <%}else{%> ASC <%}%> <%}%>
